duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide on-site medical care such as triage, first aid, and referral to outside medical providers for Amazon Associates.
Minimize the risk of injury for Amazon Associates through awareness, education, and proactive engagement.
Maintain records of care provided to Amazon Associates and develop first aid care plans for those recovering from injuries.
Facilitate and maintain workers’ compensation and return-to-work processes for associates with work-related injuries.
Maintain a clean and orderly medical environment, monitor medical supply inventory, and provide daily activity logs and reports.
Coach and engage with Amazon Associates and managers to address at-risk work habits and ensure a safe work environment.
Participate in incident investigations, case management review meetings, and special projects as assigned.
Be willing to be trained to teach first aid, CPR, and AED certification classes.
Work flexible shifts and communicate effectively in emergencies and as a professional member of the team.
Embrace an inclusive and diverse atmosphere and follow company policies and procedures.

education_certification.credential: High school or equivalent diploma with valid certification in first aid, CPR, and AED course
